instructions:
Prepare marinade by mixing above ingredients except spare ribs. Marinate spare ribs in refrigerator for 1
hour turning twice, *(4 hours if possible)*. Broil 3 to 4 inches from element for a total of 15 minutes or until
done. Brush with remaining marinade while broiling. Serves 2.
name: Marinated Spare Ribs
creator: Carol Decker
